ght within a certain range of wavelengths.
If it is green, it reflects light within a different range of wavelengths. These
ranges do not overlap, so it is absurd to think that anything can reflect
both kinds of light. Thus, a ball cannot be both red and green all over.
3.  CLAIMTOBEREFUTED: Most children in Lake Wobegon are above average
(in intelligence).
REDUCTIO: If so, the average (intelligence) would really be higher than it is;
and then it would not be true that most children in Lake Wobe
